column2: an abortion opponent

column5: his running mate

Trump said the U.S. Supreme Court ruling Roe v Wade legalizing abortion should be overturned and that he would appoint an anti-abortion justice to the nation's highest court. column7: whose home state of Indiana has restrictive laws regulating access to abortion

column5: out of 160
column6: 000 people overall

column3: required fetal tissue be buried or cremated and made women look at their fetal ultrasounds before getting an abortion.

column1: 1	1	http://reuters.com/article/us-usa-climatechange-methane-idUSKBN13A29N	Obama administration completes rule to curb methane from federal oil
column2: gas production	"

column1: By Valerie Volcovici
| WASHINGTON
WASHINGTON The U.S. Interior Department finalized rules on Tuesday aimed at preventing methane leaks from oil and gas production on federal and tribal lands
column2: one of the last major Obama administration rules aimed at fighting climate change.Interior's Bureau of Land Management (BLM) said on Tuesday the rule
column3: updating 30-year-old regulations that govern flaring
column4: venting and natural gas leaks from oil and gas production
column5: could avoid wasting up to 41 billion cubic feet (BCF) of natural gas per year. ""This rule to prevent waste of our nation's natural gas supplies is good government
column6: plain and simple
column7: said Interior Secretary Sally Jewell. ""We are proving that we can cut harmful methane emissions that contribute to climate change
column8: while putting in place standards that make good economic sense for the nation.""Environmental groups praised the rule
column9: but industry and some western states called it unnecessary. One industry group sued BLM. The incoming Trump administration has promised to cut what it calls superfluous restrictions on energy production.

column1: An Interior Department fact sheet said that between 2009 and 2015
column2: oil and gas producers vented
column3: flared and leaked 462 BCF of natural gas on federal and Indian lands
column4: wasting as much as $23 million annually in royalty revenue.Venting and leaks during oil and gas operations cause major emissions of methane
column5: a greenhouse gas at least 25 times more potent than carbon dioxide.The rule would phase in a limit on flaring over several years affecting 16 percent of oil wells
column6: which account for 87 percent of gas flared

column1: Oil and gas operators can comply by expanding gas-capture technology or connecting wells to existing infrastructure through gathering lines.Operators would have to use technology such as infrared cameras to detect methane leaks
column2: invisible to the naked eye. BLM could also set and adjust royalty rates for oil and gas drilled on federal land to at or above 12.5 percent. Currently BLM has no discretion to raise the rate.

column1: Today's announcement is a win for Western taxpayers.  For too long
column2: big oil companies have wasted natural gas that belongs to all Americans with no accountability
column3: said Chris Saeger
column4: Director of NGO Western Values Project.""BLM is right to address methane waste from existing oil and gas facilities; these actions build on important state and federal progress already underway
column5: said Fred Krupp
column6: president of the Environmental Defense Fund.Moments after the rule's release
column7: the Western Energy Alliance and Independent Petroleum Association of America filed a lawsuit against the BLM in a Wyoming court. (Reporting By Valerie Volcovici; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama and David Gregorio)"	['Trump'

He also told the Washington Post the United States could not fund NATO at current levels.Trump's comments echoed longstanding U.S. complaints that too many NATO allies do not live up to their pledge to spend 2 percent of gross domestic product on defense. Only the United States and four other NATO allies - Greece

The association seeks immigration reform to support more high-skilled workers staying in the United States. Though Trump made tougher immigration policies a central theme of his campaign

column5: such as when Trump called for closing off parts of the internet to limit militant Islamist propaganda.
